title: Build journal entry UI with voice input
description: Create main journal entry form with textarea, voice recording, and conversation paste. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/04-journal-entry-ui.md

title: Implement MIRA user ID mapping
description: Create mapping between Firebase UIDs and MIRA user IDs. Store in Firestore collection.

title: Connect Stripe billing
description: Implement Stripe checkout flow and webhook handlers for Plus/Pro tier subscriptions

title: Create thread list and detail views
description: Build UI for auto-generated topic threads (replaces old People view)

title: Deploy MIRA-OSS service to Cloud Run
description: Deploy MIRA-OSS as sidecar service on Cloud Run with PostgreSQL and Valkey. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/01-mira-deployment.md for details.

title: Build Firebase-MIRA bridge function
description: Create analyzeEntry Cloud Function that bridges Firebase to MIRA-OSS. See docs/implementation/01-foundation/02-firebase-mira-bridge.md for implementation details.
